attributes.action: Pass Health and Safety legislation to make it illegal to travel for long journeys on a train without an allocated seat.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are not allowed to travel in a car, bus, coach etc while standing up. Why is this different for rail travel? Why are rail companies not providing seats for all it’s customers? Shouldn’t the Health and Safety Executive assess the risk to passengers who have to stand up in a train because there isn’t seating available & if there is a greater risk then appropriate Health and Safety legislation should be passed to make it obligatory to provide seating for all.
